SECTION_CONTENT:
Precautions for safe handling
Provide adequate ventilation. Handle and open container with care. Observe good industrial
hygiene practices.
Conditions for safe storage,
including any incompatibilities
Contents under pressure. Keep at temperature not exceeding 52 °C. Store in a cool, dry place out
of direct sunlight. Store in a well-ventilated place. Store away from incompatible materials (See
Section 10).
